channel.title: ecommerce on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in ecommerce on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: 8 points to help you choose the right WordPress e-Commerce solution
item.description: WordPress is a very versatile solution for e-commerce. There are many ways you can integrate or setup e-commerce with WordPress allowing you to sell goods and services at the same time as blogging or promoting them.

item.title: Comparison of Digital Music Retailers in Europe
item.description: Comment: There are a number of digital music retailers working around Europe, here is Damien Saunders’ summary of a few of the bigger services (catalogue greater than 1 million tracks).
